pages.text: The $(d)Item Collector$() can be placed on an inventory, and will collect item entities in a 3 block radius around itself.$(br2)That's a 7x7x7 cube centered on the Collector.
pages.title: Item Collector

pages.text: The $(d)Advanced Item Collector$() works the same, but has a configurable radius from 0 to 10 blocks.$(br2)Each dimension (X/Y/Z) has its own radius, as well.$(br2)You can optionally put an $(l:items/item_filter)Item Filter$(/l) in it as well, and it will only collect items that match it.
pages.title: Advanced Item Collector
